title: KeyError: 'target'
body:
I can train but error while predict 

I was install ludwig with "pip install ludwig"
and I was install Ludwig's requirements  
1. numpy
2. pandas
3. scipy
4. scikit-learn
5. scikit-image
6. spacy
7. tensorflow
8. matplotlib
9. seaborn
10. Cython
11. h5py
12. tqdm
13. tabulate
14. PyYAML

my OS : Windows 10
Python 3.6.8 :: Anaconda, Inc.

but when I predict with "ludwig predict --data_csv C:\Users\user\Desktop\heart1.csv --model_path C:\Users\user\results\experiment_run_5\model"

and will be error like this 

if you can help with this problem please help me to find the solution, thank you.

I train the model with "ludwig train --data_csv C:\Users\fian\Desktop\heart.csv --model_definition "{input_features: [{name: age, type: text}], output_features: [{name: target, type: category}]}" "

my data (csv and model): 
[sample.zip](https://github.com/uber/ludwig/files/3064283/sample.zip)




(base) C:\Users\user>ludwig predict --data_csv C:\Users\user\Desktop\heart1.csv --model_path C:\Users\user\results\experiment_run_5\model

WARNING: The TensorFlow contrib module will not be included in TensorFlow 2.0.
For more information, please see:
  * https://github.com/tensorflow/community/blob/master/rfcs/20180907-contrib-sunset.md
  * https://github.com/tensorflow/addons
If you depend on functionality not listed there, please file an issue.
